entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:54 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
